entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
